# Raluca {#raluca}

Meet Raluca Cruceru, shown in figure \@ref(fig:raluca-fig) she graduated with a BSc in Human-Computer Interaction with Industrial Experience in 2020.

```{r raluca-fig, echo = FALSE, fig.align = "center", out.width = "100%", fig.cap = "(ref:captionraluca)"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/raluca.jpeg")
```
(ref:captionraluca) Raluca Cruceru is a software engineer at CERN, standing here in front of the experiment she works on: [A Large Ion Collider Experiment (ALICE)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ALICE_experiment) part of the Large Hadron Collider at CERN, see [careers.cern/Raluca](https://careers.cern/Raluca). Picture reused with permission from [linkedin.com/in/raluca-cruceru](https://www.linkedin.com/in/raluca-cruceru/), thanks Raluca.
